name: John Bimbo Gentleman Adventurer 2+
description:
As John Bimbo and save the world from a plot to unleash an ancient sealed evil.

Featuring more than 60 levels and 8 boss fights that spans 4 hours of gameplay.
Acquire new and powerful spells as you progress.
Upgrade your abilities to take on greater challenges.

Uses WASD to move.
Mouse lets you aim and fire your spells.
The mouse wheel lets you switch between spells.
The number keys (1-5) change your spells out as well.
Pressing P will bring up the pause menu.
